description: By appointment only. Call on Monday, Tuesday, Thursday or Friday 10am-2pm to make an appointment; 01 42 49 91 30. Metro:  Colonel Fabien

description: Metro: Saint Michel / Cité
hours: Closed 24th December-6th January. From 15 years and 3 months old: Without appointment 7.30am, registration at 7.30am and between 10.30am-1pm

description: Metro:  Saint-Marcel.

description: Metro: Colonel-Fabien.
hours: Wednesday 3-6pm, Tuesday 30th December 3-6pm. Closed Wednesday 24th and 31st December

description: Free lawyers from the Paris Bar. For asylum and immigration law. The blue bus. Metro: Porte d’Aubervilliers. Attended by Maraude France Terre d’Asile.

description: Free lawyers from the Paris Bar. The blue bus. Metro: La Chapelle.
